channel.title: Death emote

item.title: Death emote
item.dc:creator: @Ancient_Arr0w Ancient Arr0w
item.description:
@Ancient_Arr0w wrote:

[code]

		//pEmote = 15;
		//pWalk = 13;
		sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!");
		setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]);
		currentHealth = 99;
		ownedTimer = 8;
		setAnimation(2304);	
		hitDiff = 0;	
		updateRequired = true; 
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		teleportToX = 2604;
		teleportToY = 3876;
	}[/code]

how can i make it so that the player does the emote before they die? o.O

what happens with me is they die and then do the emote =[. i want it to be like real rs =/

Read full topic
